attributes.additional_details:
Diane Abbots must resign or be sacked as an mp.
We feel that it makes a mockery out of us the public that a black mp can get away with being racist on more than one occasion and feel if the shoe was on the other foot of a white mp then they would get no more chances and be made to resign in an instant.
This country keeps going on about how we are all equal and yes it should be like that in this day and age which means Diane Abbots should face the same punishment as any race would do for comments like she said this means she needs to resign.
